content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Production Line at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters at (6.5, 13.5) and (10.5, 13.5)
- Additional storage chest at (6.5, 14.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab with electricity connection (id=9918)
- Input inserter at (8.5, 11.5)
- Connected to electricity network with multiple poles

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Cannot extract items from chests that don't contain the specified items (multiple attempts to extract copper plates from empty chests)
- Verify chest contents before attempting extraction

### Fuel Management Errors
- Multiple instances of attempting to insert coal when inventory is empty
- Check coal inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner-type machines

### Production Line Issues
- Automation science pack production halted due to missing ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels)
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production

### Power System Warnings
- Boiler running out of fuel
- Maintain constant fuel supply to power generation system to prevent electrical network failures

### Machine Status Issues
- Multiple inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure proper supply chain and resource availability for all production lines
- Stone furnace lacking ingredients to smelt
